abstract_summ: In order to address this issue, this paper presents a deep convolutional neural network-based method for defect detection of the cutting wheels using the industrial images.Currently, there is few effective approaches that can detect the degradation of the cutting wheel at the working station for health monitoring purpose, due to the small size of the component and the complex manufacturing operation.High fault diagnosis testing accuracies are obtained, that indicates the proposed method offers an effective and promising approach for the cutting wheel health monitoring problem.In order to work and travel safely during the outbreak of COVID-19, a method of security detection based on deep learning is proposed by using machine vision instead of manual monitoring.The need for large amounts of training data is one of the limitations of the applicability of these approaches in real-world manufacturing systems.
title_summ: Application of a Novel and Improved VGG-19 Network in the Detection of Workers Wearing MasksDeep Learning-Based Intelligent Defect Detection of Cutting Wheels with Industrial Images in ManufacturingOne-Shot Recognition of Manufacturing Defects in Steel Surfaces
title_abstract_phrases: In order to address this issue, this paper presents a deep convolutional neural network-based method for defect detection of the cutting wheels using the industrial images.Currently, there is few effective approaches that can detect the degradation of the cutting wheel at the working station for health monitoring purpose, due to the small size of the component and the complex manufacturing operation.Deep Learning-Based Intelligent Defect Detection of Cutting Wheels with Industrial Images in ManufacturingAbstract The cutting wheel is an important tool in the television liquid crystal display (LCD) panel manufacturing process.For the future social health and safety to provide favorable test data.High fault diagnosis testing accuracies are obtained, that indicates the proposed method offers an effective and promising approach for the cutting wheel health monitoring problem.
